name: Snake
short_description:
This is a cross-platform implementation of the classical game called snake. It is written in C++ and it uses ncurses and OpenGL/GLUT. 

As of right now, this is only a sample project that I created to learn how to use Git and other open-source technologies, as well as to get some actual programming expirience. In the future, I am planning to take this project much further then the limits of a simple game of snake, if time permits.

Feel free to join me in the development of this project.
